20101216020710.333|20101216020712.000|CCO|MISTAKE.

20101216020815.333|20101216020818.667|CCO|THE COLOR OF A RICH MERLOT.
20101216020818.667|20101216020822.000|CCO|THE LAMPS ARE BY TIFFANY.
20101216020822.000|20101216020825.333|CCO|THE STAINED GLASS DOOR WAS 
20101216020825.333|20101216020828.667|CCO|INSPIRED BY THE GAMBLE HOUSE.
20101216020828.667|20101216020832.000|CCO|IT LEADS TO A TINY OCTAGONAL 
20101216020832.000|20101216020834.500|CCO|BEDROOM LIKE ON A BOAT.
20101216020834.500|20101216020837.000|CCO|I WAS LUCKY TO FIND AN OLD 
20101216020837.000|20101216020839.500|CCO|BURGUNDY SINK FOR THIS VANITY,
